subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal, the No. 2 seed, beat No. 22 Jurgen Melzer 6-2, 6-3, 7-6 (6). Robin Soderling needed more time and energy to bat away No. 15 Tomas Berdych.
snippet: Rafael Nadal, the No. 2 seed, beat No. 22 Jurgen Melzer 6-2, 6-3, 7-6 (6). Robin Soderling needed more time and energy to bat away No. 15 Tomas Berdych.
